brand_identity.name: DL Law Corporation
brand_identity.archetype: Swiss & High-Contrast (Authority) mixed with Organic & Earthy (Trust)

typography.instructions: Add the following import to index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Playfair+Display:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap');

buttons.default: rounded-md shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 font-medium

cards.default: rounded-lg border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.wrapper: relative w-full overflow-auto rounded-md border shadow-sm
tables.head: h-12 px-4 text-left align-middle font-medium text-muted-foreground [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0

glassmorphism.header: bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-border/40 sticky top-0 z-50

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text).
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria_labels: Required for icon-only buttons and inputs.

login.layout: Split screen: Left side image (login_bg) with overlay, Right side form.
login.features: JWT Auth, Remember Me, Forgot Password link.

dashboard.layout: Sidebar + Top Header + Main Content Area.
dashboard.widgets: Role-based. Admin sees all stats. Employee sees personal stats (Leave balance, Attendance).

employees.layout: Data Table with filters (Role, Status, Department).
employees.actions: Add Employee (Modal), Edit, Suspend, View Profile.

id_cards.layout: Card Generator. Preview on left, Controls on right.
id_cards.style: Vertical ID card. Photo top, Name/Role middle, QR/Barcode bottom. DLLC Branding.

business_cards.style: Horizontal. Corporate Navy Blue background for back, White for front with Gold accents.

universal_guidelines: Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings (h1-h4) to establish authority.
Use 'Inter' for all body text and UI elements for clarity.
Primary color (Navy Blue) should be used for primary actions and active states.
Secondary color (Gold) should be used sparingly for accents and premium touches.
Ensure all interactive elements have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Maintain the existing sidebar navigation structure but update the styling to match the new theme.
Ensure responsive design: Sidebar collapses to a sheet on mobile.
Use 'skeleton' loaders for data fetching states.
